item.title: Typewolf
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Typewolf (https://www.typewolf.com)/ is an online web typography resource and newsletter (https://www.typewolf.com/newsletter) created by Jeremiah Shoaf (https://www.jeremiahshoaf.com/) for all things related to typography on the web from a designer’s perspective. Typewolf is an independent site/online resource that showcases typefaces from several different type foundries and sources.
item.content:encoded: Typewolf (https://www.typewolf.com/) is an online web typography resource and newsletter (https://www.typewolf.com/newsletter) created by Jeremiah Shoaf (https://www.jeremiahshoaf.com/) for all things related to typography on the web from a designer’s perspective. Typewolf is an independent site/online resource that showcases typefaces from several different type foundries and sources.

item.title: UI Animation Newsletter
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: A great source for motion UI inspiration by Val Head. You can subscribe on her UI Animation Newsletter web page.
item.content:encoded: A great source for motion UI inspiration by Val Head. You can subscribe on her UI Animation Newsletter web page.

item.title: Web Designer Depot Newsletter
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: The Web Designer Depot Newsletter contains quick bits of industry news, inspirational resources, as well as information regarding new products and services for designers.
item.content:encoded: The Web Designer Depot Newsletter contains quick bits of industry news, inspirational resources, as well as information regarding new products and services for designers.

item.title: Smashing Magazine Email Newsletter
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: The Smashing Magazine Email Newsletter is an editorial email newsletter sent twice a month with useful tips, tricks and resources for designers and developers — thoroughly collected, written and edited by Smashing Magazine editors exclusively for Smashing Magazine readers.
item.content:encoded: The Smashing Magazine Email Newsletter is an editorial email newsletter sent twice a month with useful tips, tricks and resources for designers and developers — thoroughly collected, written and edited by Smashing Magazine editors exclusively for Smashing Magazine readers.
